title: eXtreme Programming for .NET Developers
eventShortDescription:
​*Discontinued* ​​

Presented by Adam Cogan, this session will cover how to incorporate eXtreme Programming practices with .NET- connected technologies to create high quality, low cost software. Adam will walk you through the 12 tenets of eXtreme Programming and then tell you what works and what doesn't. 
How to implement is discussed and demo'ed in the context of Visual Studio.​​
